explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a sports top, black shorts, and glasses is gripping the handrails of workout equipment with both hands. He has his feet on the side of the equipment and is looking to the right. In the background, we can see other workout equipment, tall trees, and a row of houses in the distance.

[0-5] A man in a black top and yellow shorts runs in from the left. He steps onto the workout equipment, imitating the man with glasses. The man with glasses notices him, looks puzzled, and gets off the equipment, standing in front of it. Seeing the man in black standing in front of the equipment, the man with glasses imitates him and stands beside him.

He raises both hands, resting his right arm on his left hand, and looks to the right, supporting his head with his right hand. The man in black watches and imitates him, supporting his head with his right hand and standing beside him. The man with glasses turns around and finds the man in black still copying him.
